CODE         	LONG DESCRIPTION                	SHORT DESCRIPTION    
A            	WET RUNWAY                       	WETRWY                    
B            	ICE/SLUSH RUNWAY                 	ICESLS                     
C            	SOFT SHOULDERS                   	SOFTSH                     
D            	DITCHING                         	DITCH                      
E            	EMERGENCY LANDING                	EMLAND                     
F            	FIRE AFTER CRASH                	FIRE                       
G            	GLASSY WATER                     	GLASSY                    
H            	HIDDEN HAZARDOUS OBJECTS         	HAZOBS                     
I            	ICING ON AIRCRAFT                	ICING                      
J            	SHIFTING FUEL CARGO              	SHIFT                      
K            	HIGH VEGETATION                  	HIGHVG                     
L            	SABOTAGE                         	SABOTG                     
M            	DECOMPRESSION, HYPOXIA           	DECOMP                    
N            	PAX DISTURBANCE                  	PAXDST                    
O            	PRECAUTIONARY LANDING            	PRECLD                     
P            	ROUGH WATER                      	ROUGHW                    
Q            	SNOW BANK                        	SNOBNK                     
R            	UNDERTERMINED                    	UNDET                      
S            	INADEQUATE RWY, TAXIWAY LGTS     	ACEVAC                     
T            	DOWNDRAFT                        	DWNDRF                    
U            	BLADE STALL                      	BLADST                    
V            	OTHER/MISCELLANEOUS              	MISCL                      
W            	STOLEN AIRCRAFT                 	STOLAC                     
X            	BIRD STRIKE                      	BIRDS                      
Y            	DENSITY ALTITUDE                 	DENALT                     
Z            	WEATHER                          	WX                         
1            	VISION OBSCURED BY SUN           	VISOBS                     
2            	WINDSHIELD-OIL,FOG,ICE, RAIN     	FOGICE                     
3            	PILOT FATIGUE OR LACK OF REST    	PLTFAT                     
4            	ROUGH OR RUTTED SOD              	RUFF                       
5            	GUSTY WINDS                      	WIND                       
6            	STRUCK ANIMAL                    	ANMLS                      
7            	SETTLING W/POWER                 	SETTL W/PWR               
8            	LOSS OF TAIL ROTOR EFFECT        	LT EFFECT                  
99999        	CONTRIBUTING CAUSE INVALID       	ERROR MESSAGE
